channel.title: [pi] cant run or compile
channel.description:
i'v got windows 7 64-bit. ok first off i'v set environmental paths etc and i still cant run or compile my server when i do the cmd just flashes and goes off this is my jdk location C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24 and
jre
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6
this is my run.bat code
@echo off cd Client Files "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause
this is compile code
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
i'd appreciate it if you could give me the codes to make it work.

item.title: [pi] cant run or compile
item.dc:creator: @smil3 smil3
item.description:
@smil3 wrote:

try : C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24

and : C:\Program Files\Java\jre6

then : “C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

and : “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe” *.java

good luck

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] cant run or compile
item.dc:creator: @isotonic2011 isotonic2011
item.description:
@isotonic2011 wrote:

i’v got windows 7 64-bit.
ok first off i’v set environmental paths etc and i still cant run or compile my server when i do the cmd just flashes and goes off
this is my jdk location
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24 and

jre

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6

this is my run.bat code

@echo off
cd Client Files
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

this is compile code

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

i’d appreciate it if you could give me the codes to make it work.
